melody.description: There is no melody or mood associated with this line, which may be because it is the preamble to the hymn, or is not meant to be read in any particular melody or mood

author.author: None
author.description: There is no author associated with this line, as it may be the preamble to the hymn

text: ਕਰਿ ਕਿਰਪਾ ਪ੍ਰਭ ਅੰਤਰਜਾਮੀ ਸਾਧਸੰਗਿ ਹਰਿ ਪਾਈਐ ॥

translation.text: Show Your Mercy, O God, O Searcher of hearts, that in the Saadh Sangat, the Company of the Holy, I might obtain You, Lord.

transliteration.text: kar kirapā prabh antarajāmī sādhasang har pāīai .

melody.description: Aasaa has strong emotions of inspiration and courage. This Raag gives the listener the determination and ambition to put aside any excuses and to proceed with the necessary action to achieve the aim. It generates feelings of passion and zeal to succeed and the energy generated from these feelings enables the listener to find the strength from within to achieve success, even when the achievement seems difficult. The determined mood of this Raag ensures that failure is not an option and motivates the listener to be inspired.

author.author: Guru Arjan Dev
author.description:
Guru Arjan Dev [1563 - 1606] was the fifth Guru of the Sikhs, born at Goindval. He was the youngest of the three sons of Guru Ram Das, the fourth Sikh Guru.

Guru Arjan Dev finished the construction of the Harimandir Sahib, the Golden Temple, and compiled the first Sikh scripture, known as the Adi Granth. Shortly after he became the first martyr of the Sikh religion, which formed a turning point in the development of the faith.

text: ਖੋਲਿ ਕਿਵਾਰ ਦਿਖਾਲੇ ਦਰਸਨੁ ਪੁਨਰਪਿ ਜਨਮਿ ਨ ਆਈਐ ॥੧॥

translation.text: When You open Your Door, and reveal the Blessed Vision of Your Darshan, the mortal is not relegated to reincarnation again. ||1||

transliteration.text: khōl kivār dikhālē darasan punarap janam n āīai .1.

melody.description: Aasaa has strong emotions of inspiration and courage. This Raag gives the listener the determination and ambition to put aside any excuses and to proceed with the necessary action to achieve the aim. It generates feelings of passion and zeal to succeed and the energy generated from these feelings enables the listener to find the strength from within to achieve success, even when the achievement seems difficult. The determined mood of this Raag ensures that failure is not an option and motivates the listener to be inspired.

text: ਮਿਲਉ ਪਰੀਤਮ ਸੁਆਮੀ ਅਪੁਨੇ ਸਗਲੇ ਦੂਖ ਹਰਉ ਰੇ ॥

translation.text: Meeting with my Beloved Lord aand Master, all my pains are taken away.

transliteration.text: milau parītam suāmī apunē sagalē dūkh harau rē .

melody.description: Aasaa has strong emotions of inspiration and courage. This Raag gives the listener the determination and ambition to put aside any excuses and to proceed with the necessary action to achieve the aim. It generates feelings of passion and zeal to succeed and the energy generated from these feelings enables the listener to find the strength from within to achieve success, even when the achievement seems difficult. The determined mood of this Raag ensures that failure is not an option and motivates the listener to be inspired.

text: ਪਾਰਬ੍ਰਹਮੁ ਜਿਨ੍ਹਿ ਰਿਦੈ ਅਰਾਧਿਆ ਤਾ ਕੈ ਸੰਗਿ ਤਰਉ ਰੇ ॥੧॥ ਰਹਾਉ ॥

translation.text: I am saved and carried across, in the company of those who remember the Supreme Lord God in their hearts. ||1||Pause||

transliteration.text: pārabraham jinh ridai arādhiā tā kai sang tarau rē .1. rahāu .

melody.description: Aasaa has strong emotions of inspiration and courage. This Raag gives the listener the determination and ambition to put aside any excuses and to proceed with the necessary action to achieve the aim. It generates feelings of passion and zeal to succeed and the energy generated from these feelings enables the listener to find the strength from within to achieve success, even when the achievement seems difficult. The determined mood of this Raag ensures that failure is not an option and motivates the listener to be inspired.

text: ਮਹਾ ਉਦਿਆਨ ਪਾਵਕ ਸਾਗਰ ਭਏ ਹਰਖ ਸੋਗ ਮਹਿ ਬਸਨਾ ॥

translation.text: This world is a great wilderness, an ocean of fire, in which mortals abide, in pleasure and pain.

transliteration.text: mahā udiān pāvak sāgar bhaē harakh sōg mah basanā .

melody.description: Aasaa has strong emotions of inspiration and courage. This Raag gives the listener the determination and ambition to put aside any excuses and to proceed with the necessary action to achieve the aim. It generates feelings of passion and zeal to succeed and the energy generated from these feelings enables the listener to find the strength from within to achieve success, even when the achievement seems difficult. The determined mood of this Raag ensures that failure is not an option and motivates the listener to be inspired.

text: ਸਤਿਗੁਰੁ ਭੇਟਿ ਭਇਆ ਮਨੁ ਨਿਰਮਲੁ ਜਪਿ ਅੰਮ੍ਰਿਤੁ ਹਰਿ ਰਸਨਾ ॥੨॥

translation.text: Meeting with the True Guru, the mortal becomes immaculately pure; with his tongue, he chants the Ambrosial Name of the Lord. ||2||

transliteration.text: satigur bhēt bhaiā man niramal jap anmrit har rasanā .2.

melody.description: Aasaa has strong emotions of inspiration and courage. This Raag gives the listener the determination and ambition to put aside any excuses and to proceed with the necessary action to achieve the aim. text: ਤਨੁ ਧਨੁ ਥਾਪਿ ਕੀਓ ਸਭੁ ਅਪਨਾ ਕੋਮਲ ਬੰਧਨ ਬਾਂਧਿਆ ॥

translation.text: He preserves his body and wealth, and takes everything as his own; such are the subtle bonds which bind him.

transliteration.text: tan dhan thāp kīō sabh apanā kōmal bandhan bānhdhiā .

melody.description: Aasaa has strong emotions of inspiration and courage. text: ਗੁਰ ਪਰਸਾਦਿ ਭਏ ਜਨ ਮੁਕਤੇ ਹਰਿ ਹਰਿ ਨਾਮੁ ਅਰਾਧਿਆ ॥੩॥

translation.text: By Guru's Grace, the mortal becomes liberated, meditating on the Name of the Lord, Har, Har. ||3||

transliteration.text: gur parasād bhaē jan mukatē har har nām arādhiā .3.

text: ਰਾਖਿ ਲੀਏ ਪ੍ਰਭਿ ਰਾਖਨਹਾਰੈ ਜੋ ਪ੍ਰਭ ਅਪੁਨੇ ਭਾਣੇ ॥

translation.text: God, the Savior, has saved those, who are pleasing to the Will of God.

transliteration.text: rākh līē prabh rākhanahārai jō prabh apunē bhānē .

text: ਜੀਉ ਪਿੰਡੁ ਸਭੁ ਤੁਮ੍ਹਰਾ ਦਾਤੇ ਨਾਨਕ ਸਦ ਕੁਰਬਾਣੇ ॥੪॥੧੧॥੫੦॥

translation.text: The soul and body are all Yours, O Great Giver; O Nanak, I am forever a sacrifice. ||4||11||50||

transliteration.text: jīu pind sabh tumharā dātē nānak sad kurabānē .4.11.50.
